params.name: text
params.description: Text to use within the breadcrumbs item.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the breadcrumb item link href attribute.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the individual crumb.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to use for the current page.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the current page link href attribute.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the container.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.
